text: Not sure where this should go, but I want to add a link to each logo in this module in order to link to their websites. I'm not a dev but play that role on my small marketing team. Any guidance would be appreciated!
Hi, you have to add new link field same as image and encapsulate in a group with repeater option and then add snippet
When you say "encapsulate in a group with a repeater option"... what do you mean? (Sorry, little over my head :))
I think you'd want <a href="websiteaddress"><img src={{item.src}} ...></a>

The question is, where do you get the website address? For that, you need to refer to a property of that item... e.g. item.webaddress

<a href="{{item.webaddress}}"/><img src={{item.src}...></a>
In order to do that, you need to add a property to the logo field. Click Add field, select text, and give the field the name webaddress
Looks like this might already be wrapped in a "repeater" (lets you create multiple e.g. images when you edit a module instance in a page)
pretty sure it's not :slightly_smiling_face: at least not without the help of HS support.. and they'll prrrrrrrobably say no
